Format Proportion as Percentage String

Source: R/minisig.R
fmt_percent.Rd

Formats a numeric proportion as a percentage string with optional number of digits and spacing.

Usage

fmt_percent(proportion, digits = 0, space = TRUE)

Arguments

proportion

Numeric value representing the proportion to format (between 0 and 1).

digits

Integer indicating the number of decimal places. Defaults to 0.

space

Logical indicating whether to include a space before the percent sign. Defaults to TRUE.

Value

A character string representing the formatted percentage.

Examples

fmt_percent(0.75)
#> [1] "75 %"
fmt_percent(0.12345, digits = 2)
#> [1] "12.35 %"
fmt_percent(0.5, space = FALSE)
#> [1] "50%"
